Name: Word
Primer-Dolch: Sentences

Name: all
Primer-Dolch: All the birds sang.^We ate all the cookies.^All the kids ran fast.

Name: am
Primer-Dolch: I am happy.^I am ready to play.^I am learning to read.

Name: are
Primer-Dolch: They are friends.^We are at the park.^The dogs are loud.

Name: at
Primer-Dolch: Meet me at school.^Look at the sky.^She is at home.

Name: ate
Primer-Dolch: I ate my lunch.^He ate an apple.^We ate together.

Name: be
Primer-Dolch: I want to be kind.^She will be here soon.^Try to be patient.

Name: black
Primer-Dolch: The cat is black.^I have a black hat.^The shoes are black.

Name: brown
Primer-Dolch: The dog is brown.^She wore a brown coat.^I saw a brown bird.

Name: but
Primer-Dolch: I like it but not today.^He ran fast but fell.^I want to go but cannot.

Name: came
Primer-Dolch: She came to play.^He came with a gift.^They came early.

Name: did
Primer-Dolch: He did his work.^Did you see that?^I did not know.

Name: do
Primer-Dolch: Do your homework.^I can do it.^Do not run.

Name: eat
Primer-Dolch: I like to eat apples.^We eat lunch at noon.^Do you eat breakfast?

Name: four
Primer-Dolch: I have four pencils.^She saw four birds.^We need four chairs.

Name: get
Primer-Dolch: Get your coat.^Can you get the ball?^I will get it for you.

Name: good
Primer-Dolch: You did a good job.^She is a good friend.^The food is good.

Name: have
Primer-Dolch: I have a cat.^Do you have a pen?^We have fun today.

Name: he
Primer-Dolch: He is my brother.^He can run fast.^I saw him and he waved.

Name: into
Primer-Dolch: The cat jumped into the box.^Go into the room.^She walked into the park.

Name: like
Primer-Dolch: I like ice cream.^Do you like to play?^They like the story.

Name: must
Primer-Dolch: You must listen.^We must be careful.^I must finish my work.

Name: new
Primer-Dolch: I have a new book.^She bought a new hat.^The shoes are new.

Name: no
Primer-Dolch: No
column3: I cannot go.^He said no.^There is no milk.

Name: now
Primer-Dolch: Come here now.^I am ready now.^We must leave now.

Name: on
Primer-Dolch: The book is on the table.^Sit on the chair.^Put the hat on.

Name: our
Primer-Dolch: Our dog is big.^This is our home.^We are happy in our class.

Name: out
Primer-Dolch: Go out to play.^The cat ran out.^Look out for cars.

Name: please
Primer-Dolch: Please help me.^Can you

Name: pretty
Primer-Dolch: She is very pretty.^The flowers are pretty.^What a pretty dress.

Name: ran
Primer-Dolch: He ran fast.^The kids ran to school.^She ran away quickly.

Name: ride
Primer-Dolch: I like to ride my bike.^Can we ride together?^He will ride the horse.

Name: saw
Primer-Dolch: I saw a bird.^She saw the rainbow.^We saw a cat outside.

Name: say
Primer-Dolch: Please say hello.^I will say my name.^What did you say?

Name: she
Primer-Dolch: She is my friend.^She can jump high.^I saw her and she smiled.

Name: so
Primer-Dolch: It is cold
column3: so wear a coat.^I was tired

Name: soon
Primer-Dolch: We will go soon.^Dinner will be ready soon.^He will arrive soon.

Name: that
Primer-Dolch: That is my book.^I like that toy.^Did you see that?

Name: there
Primer-Dolch: There is a cat.^Look over there.^We went there yesterday.

Name: they
Primer-Dolch: They are my friends.^They ran fast.^I saw them at the park.

Name: this
Primer-Dolch: This is my pencil.^I like this game.^Read this book.

Name: too
Primer-Dolch: I want to go too.^She is tall too.^It is hot too.

Name: under
Primer-Dolch: The ball is under the table.^Look under your bed.^She hid under the chair.

Name: want
Primer-Dolch: I want a cookie.^Do you want to play?^He wants to go outside.

Name: was
Primer-Dolch: He was happy.^It was raining.^She was here yesterday.

Name: well
Primer-Dolch: She did well on the test.^I hope you are well.^He sings well.

Name: went
Primer-Dolch: We went to the park.^She went home.^He went quickly.

Name: what
Primer-Dolch: What is that?^What do you want?^Tell me what happened.

Name: white
Primer-Dolch: The cat is white.^She has a white dress.^The paper is white.

Name: who
Primer-Dolch: Who is there?^Do you know who came?^I asked who wants to play.

Name: will
Primer-Dolch: I will help you.^She will be there.^We will go soon.

Name: with
Primer-Dolch: I went with him.^She plays with her friend.^I am with you.

Name: yes
Primer-Dolch: Yes
